name: Boom Buddies
description:
Boom Buddies is a bomberman-esque game with local two player versus.

Controls (Player1/Player2):

  • W, A, S, D/ Num8, Num4, Num5, Num6 - Move
  • Space / Num0 - Plant bomb

Plant bombs and try to hit your friend. Players are damaged more if they are closer to the bomb when it explodes.

Get powerups to move faster, create a bigger explosion or heal a bit.
